name: React FlyweightList
tagline: A React list component that uses a Flyweight pattern to render its content
body:
### React FlyweightList Component Demos
This site provides links to demonstrate the React FlyweightList component.

[Here](https://github.com/contact) you will find a demo of appending 10.000 elements on a document, and [here](https://github.com/contact) the same 10.000 elements loaded using the React Flyweight component.

To better appreciate the difference, head on to the pages with your mobile device
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
